channel.title: Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Easily accessible log of notable changes to Logging 2019-08-30 Now quotes requested by Speed have the same sessionID that quotes requested by the client in order to identify them. Now reference filters are arrays in order to be able to request multiple reerences at once. 2019-08-22 Added the field hotel in the input object reference from which bookings can be searched by the hotel’s reference.

item.title: GraphQL Schema breaking changes
item.description: Changes history of deprecated notes previously announced
